text: For core HubL (Jinjava) features like filters, you can file issues here: <https://github.com/HubSpot/jinjava/issues>

In content settings it would be nice if there was a way to set a featured image for a blog listing page(for the OG tags) As developers we can do this by including an if is_listing_page with the og code in there but I feel like HS will add this feature anyways since you added it to pages. Implementing this with code feels silly as it feels like only a matter of time till you guys add the feature which then causes my og tag to conflict.
